       Black Aracnia looked to the other Predacons after they had landed the 
transports containing the Ice Caves computer systems in the new HQ. THe 
Predacons were gathered under the largest of the transports.
       "Alright, were heading out to the CF to help Hell Beast. On they way 
we picked up an Allience transmission. Looks like theyre sending in a calvary 
of there own." She said, armed.
       Tarantulas gave a brief chuckle. "And who made you leader?" His 
crimsom eyes were narrowed down to menacing slits.
       Aracnia ignored him. "Arm yourselfs. This is going to get very, very 
messy."
       Adrax, Aerostreak, Aquarious, Black Aracnia, Gremlin, Jackle, 
Paddletail, Pheniox, Tankkor, and Tarantulas headed out, there destination 
was the Cybertronian Fire and Maximal defeat was thier goal.



       Ominous Prime paced the table. He had failed miserable agianst the 
Maximals....and he had made enemies. He didnt care that the Predacons had 
vowed for revenge, it was the fact that of all the factions he could be 
defeated by, it had to be the Maximals. Revenge was definet.
       "I can see the CF is under heavy fire. It seems like a ripe 
oppertunity to not only seek revenge on the Maximals, but the Predacons are 
heading there as well." Putnam said, looking at the scans.
       Ominous nodded.  WIthin minutes the 6 Energonians were airborne and 
directed towrds the Cybertronian Fire.



--part1_7c.11cd3593.27c189b4_boundary
